entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.2°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
